messages.subject: Re: [Louisiana again
messages.msgSnippet: Yes you are right about cajun being in Acadiana, not New Orleans, my friend. Of course, I do not miss the humidity (People here think it is humid also!!. . can
messages.messageBody:
Yes you are right about cajun being in Acadiana, not New Orleans, my friend.
Of course, I do not miss the humidity (People here think it is humid also!!.
. can you imagine??) nor do I miss the fire ants, which I stepped into a big
pile on Monday. You cannot compare the food from anywhere else to what you
find in Acadiana, because there is nothing like it anywhere else.

It seems we were in Lafayette at the same time. . .I just left two years ago
and had been there since 1982. I was unschooling then, but there were really
no others doing that at that time in the area. I have a daughter who is 12
also, or will be on Thursday, and a son who is 22 months.

lovemary
If you wanna make the world a better place, take a look at yourself, and then
make a change.


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
